creator: hppyhjh@163.com
text:
Created attachment 34009
junk character in 'Response Data' but OK in 'Response Message'

1. in JSR223 Sampler (Groovy). 
A string contains Chinese characters.
then,
SampleResult.setResponseMessage for it, and
SampleResult.setResponseData for it

2. run the Sampler

3. in View Results Tree
Displayed OK in 'Sampler result' 's Response Message.
But, Displayed NOT OK in Response Data
I expected all OK.

plz refer to the attachement.

I'm v sorry for give this bug.

If set as following in jmeter.properties, it's ok:

# The encoding to be used if none is provided (default ISO-8859-1)
sampleresult.default.encoding=GBK

So it's not a bug. it's my fault.
creator: hppyhjh@163.com
